alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Camden, southern Glynn, central Pierce, Brantley, southwestern Wayne and southern Appling Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blackshear to near Nahunta to 9 miles east of Woodbine. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Blackshear, Woodbine, Nahunta, Patterson, Dock Junction, Offerman, Hickox and Country Club Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
